document.full_text: the u.s. military on wednesday ordered troops to stay at least 50 miles away from a crippled japanese nuclear power plant and started prescribing medication ahead of higher-risk missions amid growing concerns about radiation.
document.title: u.s. forces kept away from japan nuclear plant area
lines_and_colors: the u.s. military on wednesday ordered troops to stay at least 50 miles away from a crippled japanese nuclear power plant and started prescribing medication ahead of higher-risk missions amid growing concerns about radiation.
